content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI remembered asking my computer to Google how to sign up for the online Spanish writing course offered by Instituto Hemingway, and received search results including links to the Instituto Hemingway website and other websites such as GoAbroad and GoOverseas. I then used the command "browse_website" to access the Go Overseas website and asked for details about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers offered by Instituto Hemingway.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text states that it does not provide information on the details of the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers offered by Instituto Hemingway through Go Overseas. \n \n Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.gooverseas.com/providers/instituto-hemingway/programs/online-spanish-course-for-heritage-speakers-158314#main-content)', '\\n\\n (https://www.gooverseas.com/)', ' Menu  (https://www.gooverseas.com/providers/instituto-hemingway/programs/online-spanish-course-for-heritage-speakers-158314#nav)', 'Study Abroad (https://www.gooverseas.com/study-abroad)', 'Volunteer Abroad (https://www.gooverseas.com/volunteer-abroad)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "how to sign up for online spanish writing course for heritage speakers offered by Instituto Hemingway through Go Overseas"}}}'}]
"""
